name: Jefferson Mesiakaa
title: Director, Research Lead
bio: A seasoned research professional with over a decade of experience in program design and evidence analysis with emphasis on M&E and KM. Holds a PhD in Demography and brings strong multidisciplinary expertise.

name: Collins Mudiope
title: Director, Field Specialist
bio: An expert in public health programming with 9+ years delivering donor-funded programs. MBA candidate with deep expertise in data collection methodologies and reporting standards.

name: Benson Onor
title: Data Analytics Advisor
bio: Highly skilled in data science and analytical frameworks with experience in statistical modelling, visualization and leveraging predictive modeling to inform strategic decision-making.

name: Wangu Ishmael
title: Strategy Advisor
bio: Senior policy expert with deep expertise in socioeconomically diverse, conflict-sensitive, and context-specific leadership.

name: George Vitaal
title: Policy & Delivery Consultant
bio: Independent policy strategist with decades of experience in program management, donor relations and operational leadership.
